vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.11
Another name of chi.ram (חִירָם "Hiram" H2438)
§ Huram = "noble born"
1) son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
2) king of Tyre allied with David and Solomon; alternate spelling for 'Hiram'
3) a chief architect of Solomon's temple; alternate spelling for 'Hiram'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Bela; tribu de Benjamín; (b) חִירוֹם ,חִירָם   rey de Tiro; en tiempos de David y Salomón; (c) חִירוֹם ,חִירָם   artesano; de Tiro; en tiempos de Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
戶蘭 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "出身高貴"
1) 比拉的眾子之一, 便雅憫的孫子 (代上 8:5)
2) 大衛王和所羅門王的盟拜推羅王; 又稱為 '希蘭'
3) 所羅門王建殿工程中的一位首席工匠; 又稱 '希蘭' (代下 4:11,16)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
户兰 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "出身高贵"
1) 比拉的众子之一, 便雅悯的孙子 (代上 8:5)
2) 大卫王和所罗门王的盟拜推罗王; 又称为 '希兰'
3) 所罗门王建殿工程中的一位首席工匠; 又称 '希兰' (代下 4:11,16)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043); also called Huphamite at Num.26.39; Hupham at Num.26.39; Huram in1Ch.8.5;
Another name of chup.pim (חֻפִּים "Huppim" H2650H)
§ Huram = "noble born"
1) son of Bela and grandson of Benjamin
2) king of Tyre allied with David and Solomon; alternate spelling for 'Hiram'
3) a chief architect of Solomon's temple; alternate spelling for 'Hiram'
